section.name: Composite Configuration Details

subsection.name: Saving Changes
subsection.p: If you have a non static Configuration where you want to save changes made to a configuration, and you are using a CompositeConfiguration, then you will need to pass into the constructor of the CompositeConfiguration what Configuration to save the changes via.
